ForearmsLVSeatedPronation.name: Lever Seated Forearm Pronation
ForearmsLVSeatedPronation.preparation: Sit on seat. Grasp rotating handles with underhand grip on each side and place forearms on pads.
ForearmsLVSeatedPronation.execution: Rotate shafts by turning palm downward. Return and repeat.
ForearmsLVSeatedPronation.comments: Depending on participants range of motion and machines design, handles may need to be prerotated so resistance is present throughout movement, particularly initial phase of rotation. See forearm pronation up close.

ForearmsLVPronation.name: Lever Standing Forearm Pronation
ForearmsLVPronation.preparation: Grasp open handle at end of shaft with underhand grip.
ForearmsLVPronation.execution: Rotate shaft by turning palm downward. Return and repeat.
ForearmsLVPronation.comments: Depending on participants range of motion and machines design, handle may need to be prerotated so resistance is present throughout movement, particularly initial phase of rotation.
